result.adr_address: Petra Kalnyshevskoho St, 6, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: Crust

reviews.text: I visit this establishment not for the first time, I really like it üíñ I am surprised that they write about sour milk, I took both cocoa and coffee and did not feel any acid in the milk, on the contrary, it is very tasty. Also, more than once I saw that fresh milk and desserts were brought to me, I take coffee in the morning. I asked about how often fresh desserts are delivered - they answered every 2 days. So everything is definitely fresh and of high quality üëåüèº

I come here to work, the Internet has become better. Each table has its own outlet, which is very convenient. A panini appeared recently, now I'm waiting for a pizza. Delicious coffee, I take a banana latte, there is always vegetable milk and many types of it.

Coffee with sour milk, the ‚Äútrick‚Äù of this establishmentüëé. Taking anything that contains milk is clearly a bad idea.
The prices are quite low, the range of sweets is small, and you can order panini. In the future they promise that there will be pizza.
Crust is quite a good place to worküëç. As a place for coffee is a controversial issue. Of the minuses, I would note that the entrance to the establishment is not particularly convenient; with a stroller, it is clearly impossible to get to the stairs, and even more so, not to go inside. It will also be problematic to climb steep stairs on crutches.

A place about coffee and pizza, although there is no pizza yet, they said that they are finishing the renovations, while hope does not fade for a delicious pizza, I‚Äôm really looking forward to it, there are few places around where you can get an acceptable one!
About the visit: the renovation is ‚Äúdamp‚Äù, not cozy, just some things are placed, but it may have just opened. There is a hall where you can stay, it is fenced off by a wall from the entrance.
Thanks to the barista (the girl who made coffee and greeted me), she was friendly, sociable, answered questions and gave me a business card, set the atmosphere in an empty space)
The entrance is not convenient, but this is due to the location of the place; it seems that you are sneaking along a narrow ladder under someone‚Äôs balcony)
The assortment of sweets is small, we took a tube - it was not tasty, the waffle was dry (you felt like you were going to hurt your gums) and the filling was too sweet (subjective here).
Prices are low. It‚Äôs amazing in our time, I‚Äôm even unaccustomed to this.
Experience: the coffee was a failure, the water tasted something sour, I took Americano. Cocoa was a failure, the first thing that came across was lumps of unmixed powder on top and the milk was sour. Not missing, probably, maybe it‚Äôs the cheapest thing that‚Äôs on sale or has been open for a long time, but it‚Äôs a fiasco. Here even Jacobs 3in1 will be a leader. Both went in the trash, and I don‚Äôt throw away food until the last minute, so half of it was drunk. The rest of the day I walked and thought about the effect of milk on the body.
Impressive emotions)
The place looks like a startup. I wish it would have a mind-blowing development and there would be a line for pizza! And with coffee you need to push harder, pay attention to the milk, please)

Nice place, I heard about it from my parents, so I came to work on my laptop in the afternoon. Ordered an Americano without milk, and some sweets. One of which I received for following on Instagram. It's very calm here, not loud music in the background, there are sockets and internet to work, it hung up sometimes but I'm very satisfied with this place. There are several places to sit in company or drink coffee alone.
There is a small range of snacks here, so I can't give 5 stars. And so it is like Coffee Space, but much nicerüëç
